fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At day 1, choose a player to possess, you will become them, Becoming their role and gaining access to all their chats, If you dont, a random player is chosen.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You must do actions in your Target's player channel or their Factional Chat, your action is separate from theirs.
- You must change your server nickname and Profile picture to your target's, the host will give you a role with their name's color. (Punishable by Modkill)
- No this is not from the pok√©mon faction.
